name: Kawanakajima no Kassen / 川中島の合戦
description: "Kanakawajima no Kassen" was sold (10/26/1981) as the first game developed by Kou Shibusawa. It is a Strategy simulation game. Players become Shingen Takeda and clash with Kenshin Uesugi at Kawanakajima in an attempt to wipe out his rival.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 7, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 10 (*Japanese Ver. only) Processor: Pentium 4 1.6GHz over Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1024x768 pixel over DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 22KHz WAVE file can be played
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows® 7, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 10 (*Japanese Ver. only) Processor: Pentium 4 1.6GHz over Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1024x768 pixel over DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 22KHz WAVE file can be played
